title: Jack Damon (Camera Car Systems)
description: Jack Damon from Camera Car Systems stops by and we talk about chase vehicles for filming, 24 Hours of Lemons, sex with cars, the Lexus RX350 F Sport, rollercoasters, and death rallies.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: Jack Damon from Camera Car Systems stops by and we talk about chase vehicles for filming, 24 Hours of Lemons, sex with cars, the Lexus RX350 F Sport, rollercoasters, and death rallies.
